description: {"blocks":[{"key":"3bgc9","text":"A protocol for 16S PCR as outlined by the HUCK Genomics Core.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"ci3s3","text":"a.     Invitrogen Platinum SuperFi Master Mix","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cqu5n","text":"b.     515f Parrada Primer at 10uM","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2nmcv","text":"c.     806R Apprill Primer at 10uM","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"deelb","text":"d.     Sterile PCR H2O","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"clpj8","text":"e.     PCR Plate/Tube Rack","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8hjgq","text":"f.      Adhesive Film","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"487je","text":"g.     96-well PCR Plate or 8-well PCR tube (depending on number of samples)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"62stq","text":"h.     Pipette Tips (10ul, 20ul, 100ul, 1000ul)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"tpmv","text":"i.      Micropipettes (P10, P20, P100, P1000)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4cfr4","text":"j.      VWR marker","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3s7b4","text":"k.     Sterile Centrifuge Tubes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ad0rc","text":"Prepare your workspace","type":"align-center","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":22}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"72e3h","text":"1.     Turn on PCR Clean Hood blower and white light.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1e6ui","text":"2.     Clean the cabinet with 70% ethanol, including the work surface, walls, and glass.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fqndb","text":"3.     Turn the dial and run the UV light for 15 minutes.                                     ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7m2d6","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4qar1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ff0ls","text":"4.     Once the timer is up and the UV light turns off, you are ready to begin.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"atf0c","text":"5.     Clean all materials with 70% ethanol before putting them into the cabinet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"safety","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"ce2n","text":"Do not trust the glass to protect you from UV exposure. You can be in a different part of the lab while it is  running, but do not loiter in front of the cabinet.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
